title: Bengals-Steelers MNF Preview, The Redskins have zero plan (Football 9/30)
description:
Ryan Wilson is joined by John Breech to preview Bengals vs. Steelers on Monday Night Football (1:00). Then Jason La Canfora joins the podcast (20:00) to discuss the Redskins forcing Dwayne Haskins into action yesterday and their lack of a plan as well as the future of Jay Gruden. The guys also chat about Dan Quinn's future in Atlanta (31:00), the legitimacy of the Lions (37:00), a possible suspension for Vontaze Burfict (42:30) and the latest on Jalen Ramsey (44:45). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
